body:
I am getting the following error (running from LC/Quartz) when I try to install `XBraid` using `develop` at commit `bc53bb9`.

```
==> Fetching https://computing.llnl.gov/projects/parallel-time-integration-multigrid/download/braid_2.2.0.tar.gz

curl: (28) Connection timed out after 10001 milliseconds
==> Failed to fetch file from URL: https://computing.llnl.gov/projects/parallel-time-integration-multigrid/download/braid_2.2.0.tar.gz
    Curl failed with error 28
==> Fetching from https://computing.llnl.gov/projects/parallel-time-integration-multigrid/download/braid_2.2.0.tar.gz failed.
==> Error: FetchError: All fetchers failed for spack-stage-xbraid-2.2.0-jfwey2tvzkttt63n7hpww3gdhb2uhmz3

The https://computing.llnl.gov/projects/parallel-time-integration-multigrid/software page now directs people to the GitHub repository at https://github.com/XBraid/xbraid.  

The package `url` could be replaced with "https://github.com/XBraid/xbraid/archive/v2.2.0.tar.gz" but the `sha256` would have to be updated.

The package also only specifies version 2.2.0 while 2.3.0 is also available on Github.
title: Installation issue: XBraid `all fetchers fail` error
